languages.text: "Немногое. Они бесплотны и трудноразличимы, но в обликах их заметны черты эльдаров. Эти духи вытягивают тепло из людей, растений и вещей, но, кажется, не ведут сознательной охоты, а просто не замечают препятствий. Рассвет обращает их в дымку. Между собой призраки неодинаковы — одни темны, словно пустота, другие подобны сиянию звезд".

"Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have Aeldari features. The spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants, and inanimate objects, but it seems that they do not hunt consciously, but rather they simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."
languages.original_text: "Немногое. Они бесплотны и трудноразличимы, но в обликах их заметны черты эльдаров. Эти духи вытягивают тепло из людей, растений и вещей, но, кажется, не ведут сознательной охоты, а просто не замечают препятствий. Рассвет обращает их в дымку. Между собой призраки неодинаковы — одни темны, словно пустота, другие подобны сиянию звезд".

traits.locale_text: "Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have the Aeldari features. Those spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants and inanimate objects, but it seems that they are not hunting consciously, but rather simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they turn into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the emptiness, and others shine like the stars in the night sky".

"Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have the Aeldari features. Those spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants and inanimate objects, but it seems that they are not hunting consciously, but rather simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they turn into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the emptiness, and others shine like the stars in the night sky".

At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."

languages.text: “我们了解得不多，只知道它们缥缈无形，面目难辨，但碰巧具有某些艾达灵族的特征。这些幽灵会从人类、植物与没有生命的物体中汲取热量，但它们似乎是在无意识地狩猎，根本不会在意任何挡路的东西。在黎明时分，它们会化为薄雾消失。幽灵之间的形态也各不相同，其中一部分像虚空一样黑暗，另一部分则像夜空中的星星一样闪耀。”
languages.original_text: "Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have Aeldari features. The spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants, and inanimate objects, but it seems that they do not hunt consciously, but rather they simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: “我们了解得不多，只知道它们缥缈无形，面目难辨，但碰巧具有某些艾达灵族的特征。这些幽灵会从人类、植物与没有生命的物体中汲取热量，但它们似乎是在无意识地狩猎，根本不会在意任何挡路的东西。在黎明时分，它们会化为薄雾消失。幽灵之间的形态也各不相同，其中一部分像虚空一样黑暗，另一部分则像夜空中的星星一样闪耀。”

languages.text: «No mucho. Son incorpóreos y difíciles de reconocer, pero tienen rasgos Aeldari. Los espíritus extraen el calor de los humanos, las plantas y los objetos inanimados, pero parece que no cazan conscientemente, sino que simplemente no notan nada en su camino. Al amanecer, se disuelven en la niebla. Los espectros también son diferentes entre sí: algunos son tan oscuros como el vacío y otros brillan como las estrellas en el cielo nocturno».
languages.original_text: "Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have Aeldari features. The spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants, and inanimate objects, but it seems that they do not hunt consciously, but rather they simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: «No mucho. Son incorpóreos y difíciles de reconocer, pero tienen rasgos Aeldari. Los espíritus extraen el calor de los humanos, las plantas y los objetos inanimados, pero parece que no cazan conscientemente, sino que simplemente no notan nada en su camino. Al amanecer, se disuelven en la niebla. Los espectros también son diferentes entre sí: algunos son tan oscuros como el vacío y otros brillan como las estrellas en el cielo nocturno».

languages.text: 「それほどでもありません。彼らには実体がなく、見分けることは簡単ではありませんが、偶然にもアエルダリの特徴を持っています。精霊は人間や植物、無生物から温もりを引き出しますが、意図して狩りをすることはありません。というより、邪魔なものに気づかないだけのようです。夜明けになると、彼らは霧に包まれます。レイスの間にも違いがあるようです...ある者は虚空のように暗く、またある者は夜空の星のように輝いています」
languages.original_text: "Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have Aeldari features. The spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants, and inanimate objects, but it seems that they do not hunt consciously, but rather they simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: 「それほどでもありません。彼らには実体がなく、見分けることは簡単ではありませんが、偶然にもアエルダリの特徴を持っています。精霊は人間や植物、無生物から温もりを引き出しますが、意図して狩りをすることはありません。というより、邪魔なものに気づかないだけのようです。夜明けになると、彼らは霧に包まれます。レイスの間にも違いがあるようです...ある者は虚空のように暗く、またある者は夜空の星のように輝いています」

languages.text: « Peu de choses. Leurs corps sont intangibles et difficiles à discerner, mais on leur reconnaît tout de même des traits évoquant les Aeldaris. Les esprits absorbent la chaleur des humains, des plantes et des objets inanimés, mais ils ne semblent pas chasser de manière consciente ; on dirait plutôt qu'ils ne remarquent même pas ce qui se trouve sur leur chemin. Dès que l'aube pointe à l'horizon, c'est comme s'ils s'évaporaient dans la brume. Les spectres diffèrent également entre eux : certains sont aussi sombres que le vide spatial, tandis que d'autres brillent comme des astres dans un ciel nocturne. »
languages.original_text: "Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have Aeldari features. The spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants, and inanimate objects, but it seems that they do not hunt consciously, but rather they simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: « Peu de choses. Leurs corps sont intangibles et difficiles à discerner, mais on leur reconnaît tout de même des traits évoquant les Aeldaris. Les esprits absorbent la chaleur des humains, des plantes et des objets inanimés, mais ils ne semblent pas chasser de manière consciente ; on dirait plutôt qu'ils ne remarquent même pas ce qui se trouve sur leur chemin. Dès que l'aube pointe à l'horizon, c'est comme s'ils s'évaporaient dans la brume. Les spectres diffèrent également entre eux : certains sont aussi sombres que le vide spatial, tandis que d'autres brillent comme des astres dans un ciel nocturne. »

languages.text: "Nicht viel. Sie sind körperlos und schwierig wahrzunehmen, doch sie tragen Züge der Aeldari. Die Geister entziehen Menschen, Pflanzen und leblosen Objekten die Wärme. Sie scheinen aber nicht bewusst zu jagen, sondern bemerken einfach nichts, was ihnen im Weg steht. Im Morgengrauen lösen sie sich in Nebelschwaden auf. Es sind auch viele unterschiedliche Geister. Manche sind so dunkel wie die Leere, andere leuchten wie die Sterne am Nachthimmel."
languages.original_text: "Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have Aeldari features. The spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants, and inanimate objects, but it seems that they do not hunt consciously, but rather they simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."

Sie scheinen aber nicht bewusst zu jagen, sondern bemerken einfach nichts, was ihnen im Weg steht. Im Morgengrauen lösen sie sich in Nebelschwaden auf. Es sind auch viele unterschiedliche Geister. Manche sind so dunkel wie die Leere, andere leuchten wie die Sterne am Nachthimmel."

languages.text: "Fazla bir şey bilmiyoruz. Bunlar ruhsal varlıklar ve fark edilmeleri zor ancak bir şekilde Aeldari niteliklerine sahipler. Ruhlar; insanlardan, bitkilerden ve cansız nesnelerden sıcaklığı çekiyor ancak bilinçli bir hâlde avlanmaktan ziyade yollarına çıkan hiçbir şeyin farkında değil gibi görünüyorlar. Şafakta sise dönüşüp yok oluyorlar. Aynı zamanda bu tayflar, kendi aralarında da farklılık gösteriyor. Bazıları uçsuz kadar koyu tenli, bazılarıysa gece göğündeki yıldızlar gibi parlıyor."
languages.original_text: "Not much. They are incorporeal and difficult to discern, but they happen to have Aeldari features. The spirits draw the warmth out of humans, plants, and inanimate objects, but it seems that they do not hunt consciously, but rather they simply do not notice anything in their way. At dawn, they dissolve into mist. The wraiths also differ among themselves — some are as dark as the void, and others shine like the stars in the night sky."
